Name: SHEEP.IO
About the game: Can you create the biggest flock? Collect sheep from across the farm, steal followers from other sheep and gather the biggest flock possible! • Collect followers from across the farm • Steal followers from other sheep • Gather the biggest flock possible • Unlock new hats and skins Use the mouse, the keyboard or a gamepad to control your sheep. Run up to unclaimed sheep to have them follow you, or run up to sheep following others with less followers than you to steal them. The sheep with the most followers at the end of the round wins. Winning rounds allows you to earn gems in order to unlock new skins, colours and clothing to customise your sheep.
